author: Gerry Moriarty
title: Number of virus deaths in North now set to be ‘less severe’ than 3,000 predicted
description: Covid-19 restrictions extended for another three weeks in Northern Ireland
content:
As the Covid-19 restrictions were extended for another three weeks in Northern Ireland Minister of Health Robin Swann said the predicted number of deaths in the North was now expected to be less severe than we feared.
